title: Stan Getz & Kenny Barron - People Time 1992 - 2CD
description:
This is the last recording that Stan Getz made.

Stan Getz and Kenny Barron, People Time, 1992
Recorded in 1991, released in 1992.

PEOPLE TIME, a series of duets laying the wondrously inquisitive piano of Kenny Barron next to the breathy, half-lit tenor of Stan Getz. 
Recorded with astonishing clarity live at Copenhagen's Montmartre CafÃƒÂ©, People Time serves as a passionate coda to the life of this great saxophonist.
Many of the tunes seem chosen for their emotional content, as if Getz were aware this might be his swan song. Speculation aside, this is a remarkably gorgeous, exquisitely paced recording.
Throughout, Getz and Barron exhibit both a deep understanding of the material as well as sympathetic, truly harmonious playing. Never rushed, never brash, People Time lingers over melodies, fleshing them out and extracting every ounce of feeling. 
A must-have.

Stan Getz and Kenny Barron
People Time 1992

CD / 320Kbps

Stan Getz, Tenor Saxophone and Kenny Barron, Piano

Recorded live on March 3, 4, 5 & 6, 1991 at the CafÃƒÂ© Montmartre, Copenhagen, Denmark.

P.S 
It is widely believed that the Copenhagen gig was Stan GetzÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s last ever public appearance.
He actually played his last concert in Paris two days later on March 8, 1991.


Stan Getz, a nice bunch of guys.
